subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Chargers running back LaDainian Tomlinson has faced the Patriots only three times since he came into the league in 2001, but he has turned in memorable performances, averaging 141.7 yards.
snippet: Chargers running back LaDainian Tomlinson has faced the Patriots only three times since he came into the league in 2001, but he has turned in memorable performances, averaging 141.7 yards.
